name: Huskar
title: Sacred Warrior
lore: Huskar is a warrior of the Dezun Order, devoted to the goddess Dazzle. He grows stronger as death approaches.

innerFire.name: Inner Fire
innerFire.description: Releases an inner fire that knocks back enemies and disarms them.

burningSpear.name: Burning Spear
burningSpear.description: Imbues spears with flames, dealing damage over time but costing HP per attack.

berserkersBlood.name: Berserker's Blood
berserkersBlood.description: Huskar gains attack speed and magic resistance as his health drops.

lifeBreak.name: Life Break
lifeBreak.description: Huskar leaps at an enemy, dealing damage based on the target's current HP. Also damages himself.
